## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and what issue(s) this PR addresses.

Fixes #(issue number)

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My code follows the project's Rust style guidelines (ran `cargo fmt`)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings (`cargo clippy`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`cargo test --lib`)
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Testing

Please describe the tests you ran and how to reproduce them:

```bash
cargo test --lib
```

## Screenshots (if applicable)

If your changes affect the UI or dashboard, please include screenshots.

Any additional information that reviewers should know?
